description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nSkystalker:
At the start of battle, this creature gains [icons,1976]Whirlwind. After this creature {ACTION_casts} this spell, it gains {CONDNAME_BUFF_INVISIBLE} and 20% {STAT_intelligence}.
name: Cloudy Pelt
